data.name: ANCIENT SOULS
data.detailed_description:
It's a Souls like runner game. You can explore the level, unlock new rooms. You will dodge the traps and fight against the different enemies. You will face Bosses in every level of the temple.

You will need to master the sword technique of Divine artifact "Tyrfing" and learn the way of Allfather. You have to improve your connection with the elements and upgrade your Holy amulet "Brísingamen" with the souls of the fallen . After that you can face Thor and you can release Fenrir from his chains.

You can play demo version of this on your phone for Free
data.about_the_game:
It's a Souls like runner game. You can explore the level, unlock new rooms. You will dodge the traps and fight against the different enemies. You will face Bosses in every level of the temple.

You will need to master the sword technique of Divine artifact "Tyrfing" and learn the way of Allfather. You have to improve your connection with the elements and upgrade your Holy amulet "Brísingamen" with the souls of the fallen . After that you can face Thor and you can release Fenrir from his chains.

You can play demo version of this on your phone for Free
data.short_description: End of Time is near. Grab your sword and defeat your enemies. Follow the footpath of the betrayer. Destroy all your enemies and collect their souls. Defeat the Thor and release the Fenrir!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 7+
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB dedicated video RAM, Shader Model 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:
